title._content: Photograph of India Edwards with the First Lady and First Daughter, ca. 1948

description._content: Original Caption: Photograph of India Edwards with the First Lady and First Daughter, ca. 1948 Created By: National Archives and Records Administration. Office of Presidential Libraries. Harry S. Truman Library. (04/01/1985 - ) From: Series: Photographs Relating to the Administration, Family, and Personal Life of Harry S. Truman, compiled 1957 - 2004, documenting the period 1849 - 2004 Contact: Harry S. Truman Library (NLHST), 500 West U.S. Highway 24, Independence, MO, 64050-1798. PHONE: 816-268-8272; FAX: 816-268-8295; EMAIL:truman.reference@nara.gov. Production Dates: ca. 1948 Scope and Content Note: First Lady Bess W. Truman at a party given by journalist Esther Van Wagoner Tufty in Washington, D.C. in honor of India Edwards, Executive Director of the Women's Division of the Democratic Party. From left to right: Margaret Truman, Esther Tufty, India Edwards, Eda (Mrs. Charles) Brannan, and Mrs. Truman. Persistent URL: arcweb.archives.gov/arc/action/ExternalIdSearch?id=6233754 Truman Library URL: www.trumanlibrary.org/photographs/view.php?id=40566&rr= Access Restrictions: Unrestricted Use Restrictions: Unrestricted
